ayah: الٓمٓ
ayah_translit: alif-lam-meem
ayah_english: Alif Laam Meem

ayah: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتۡرَكُوٓاْ أَن يَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَنُونَ
ayah_translit: ahasiba al-nasu an yut'raku an yaqulu amanna wahum la yuf'tanuna
ayah_english: Do think the people that they will be left because they say We believe and they will not (be tested) (will not) be tested

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad fatanna alladhina min qablihim falaya'lamanna al-lahu alladhina sadaqu walaya'lamanna al-kadhibina
ayah_english: And indeed We tested those who (were) before them (were) before them And will surely make evident Allah those who (are) truthful and will surely make evident the liars

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

ayah: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ
ayah_translit: am hasiba alladhina ya'maluna al-sayiati an yasbiquna saa ma yahkumuna
ayah_english: Or think those who do evil deeds that they can outrun Us Evil is what they judge

ayah: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: man kana yarju liqaa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laatin wahuwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: Whoever [is] hopes (for the) meeting (with) Allah then indeed (the) Term (of) Allah (is) surely coming And He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Knower

ayah: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: man kana yarju liqaa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laatin wahuwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: Whoever [is] hopes (for the) meeting (with) Allah then indeed (the) Term (of) Allah (is) surely coming And He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Knower

ayah: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: man kana yarju liqaa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laatin wahuwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: Whoever [is] hopes (for the) meeting (with) Allah then indeed (the) Term (of) Allah (is) surely coming And He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Knower

ayah: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: waman jahada fa-innama yujahidu linafsihi inna al-laha laghaniyyun ani al-'alamina
ayah_english: And whoever strives then only he strives for himself Indeed Allah (is) Free from need of the worlds

ayah: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lanukaffiranna anhum sayyiatihim walanajziyannahum ahsana alladhi kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: And those who believe and do righteous (deeds) surely We will remove from them their evil deeds and We will surely reward them (the) best (of) what they used (to) do

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ حُسۡنٗاۖ وَإِن جَٰهَدَاكَ لِتُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ فَلَا تُطِعۡهُمَآۚ إِلَيَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi hus'nan wa-in jahadaka litush'rika bi ma laysa laka bihi il'mun fala tuti'huma ilayya marji'ukum fa-unabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: And We have enjoined (on) man goodness to his parents goodness to his parents but if they both strive against you to make you associate with Me what not you have of it any knowledge then (do) not obey both of them To Me (is) your return and I will inform you about what you used (to) do

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ حُسۡنٗاۖ وَإِن جَٰهَدَاكَ لِتُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ فَلَا تُطِعۡهُمَآۚ إِلَيَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ حُسۡنٗاۖ وَإِن جَٰهَدَاكَ لِتُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ فَلَا تُطِعۡهُمَآۚ إِلَيَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُدۡخِلَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lanud'khilannahum fi al-salihina
ayah_english: And those who believe and do righteous deeds We will surely admit them among the righteous

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُدۡخِلَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ فَإِذَآ أُوذِيَ فِي ٱللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتۡنَةَ ٱلنَّاسِ كَعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَئِن جَآءَ نَصۡرٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّا كُنَّا مَعَكُمۡۚ أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِمَا فِي صُدُورِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wamina al-nasi man yaqulu amanna bil-lahi fa-idha udhiya fi al-lahi ja'ala fit'nata al-nasi ka'adhabi al-lahi wala-in jaa nasrun min rabbika layaqulunna inna kunna ma'akum awalaysa al-lahu bi-a'lama bima fi suduri al-'alamina
ayah_english: And of the people (is he) who says We believe in Allah But when he is harmed in (the Way of) Allah he considers (the) trial (of) the people as (the) punishment (of) Allah But if comes victory from your Lord surely they say Indeed, we were with you Is not Allah most knowing of what (is) in (the) breasts (of) the worlds

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ فَإِذَآ أُوذِيَ فِي ٱللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتۡنَةَ ٱلنَّاسِ كَعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَئِن جَآءَ نَصۡرٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّا كُنَّا مَعَكُمۡۚ أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِمَا فِي صُدُورِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wamina al-nasi man yaqulu amanna bil-lahi fa-idha udhiya fi al-lahi ja'ala fit'nata al-nasi ka'adhabi al-lahi wala-in jaa nasrun min rabbika layaqulunna inna kunna ma'akum awalaysa al-lahu bi-a'lama bima fi suduri al-'alamina

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ فَإِذَآ أُوذِيَ فِي ٱللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتۡنَةَ ٱلنَّاسِ كَعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَئِن جَآءَ نَصۡرٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّا كُنَّا مَعَكُمۡۚ أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِمَا فِي صُدُورِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ فَإِذَآ أُوذِيَ فِي ٱللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتۡنَةَ ٱلنَّاسِ كَعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَئِن جَآءَ نَصۡرٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّا كُنَّا مَعَكُمۡۚ أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِمَا فِي صُدُورِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ
ayah_translit: walaya'lamanna al-lahu alladhina amanu walaya'lamanna al-munafiqina
ayah_english: And will surely make evident Allah those who believe And (He) will surely make evident the hypocrites

ayah: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ
ayah_translit: walaya'lamanna al-lahu alladhina amanu walaya'lamanna al-munafiqina

ayah: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ

ayah: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ

ayah: وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ
ayah_translit: walaya'lamanna al-lahu alladhina amanu walaya'lamanna al-munafiqina
ayah_english: And will surely make evident Allah those who believe And (He) will surely make evident the hypocrites

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّبِعُواْ سَبِيلَنَا وَلۡنَحۡمِلۡ خَطَٰيَٰكُمۡ وَمَا هُم بِحَٰمِلِينَ مِنۡ خَطَٰيَٰهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu ittabi'u sabilana walnahmil khatayakum wama hum bihamilina min khatayahum min shayin innahum lakadhibuna
ayah_english: And said those who disbelieve to those who believe Follow our way and we will carry your sins But not they (are) going to carry of their sins any thing Indeed they (are) surely liars

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّبِعُواْ سَبِيلَنَا وَلۡنَحۡمِلۡ خَطَٰيَٰكُمۡ وَمَا هُم بِحَٰمِلِينَ مِنۡ خَطَٰيَٰهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu ittabi'u sabilana walnahmil khatayakum wama hum bihamilina min khatayahum min shayin innahum lakadhibuna
ayah_english: And said those who disbelieve to those who believe Follow our way and we will carry your sins But not they (are) going to carry of their sins any thing Indeed they (are) surely liars

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّبِعُواْ سَبِيلَنَا وَلۡنَحۡمِلۡ خَطَٰيَٰكُمۡ وَمَا هُم بِحَٰمِلِينَ مِنۡ خَطَٰيَٰهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ

ayah: وَلَيَحۡمِلُنَّ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَالٗا مَّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡۖ وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: walayahmilunna athqalahum wa-athqalan ma'a athqalihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyamati amma kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: But surely they will carry their burdens and burdens with their burdens and surely they will be questioned (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection about what they used (to) invent

ayah_english: But surely they will carry their burdens and burdens with their burdens and surely they will be questioned (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection about what they used (to) invent

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ فَلَبِثَ فِيهِمۡ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٍ إِلَّا خَمۡسِينَ عَامٗا فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلطُّوفَانُ وَهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi falabitha fihim alfa sanatin illa khamsina aman fa-akhadhahumu al-tufanu wahum zalimuna
ayah_english: And verily We sent Nuh to his people and he remained among them a thousand year(s) save fifty year(s) then seized them the flood while they (were) wrongdoers

ayah: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-anjaynahu wa-ashaba al-safinati waja'alnaha ayatan lil'alamina
ayah_english: But We saved him and (the) people (of) the ship and We made it a Sign for the worlds

ayah: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۖ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ib'rahima idh qala liqawmihi u'budu al-laha wa-ittaquhu dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
ayah_english: And Ibrahim when he said to his people Worship Allah and fear Him That (is) better for you if you know

ayah: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۖ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ib'rahima idh qala liqawmihi u'budu al-laha wa-ittaquhu dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
ayah_english: And Ibrahim when he said to his people Worship Allah and fear Him That (is) better for you if you know

ayah: إِنَّمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا وَتَخۡلُقُونَ إِفۡكًاۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ لَكُمۡ رِزۡقٗا فَٱبۡتَغُواْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرِّزۡقَ وَٱعۡبُدُوهُ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لَهُۥٓۖ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: innama ta'buduna min duni al-lahi awthanan watakhluquna if'kan inna alladhina ta'buduna min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna lakum riz'qan fa-ib'taghu inda al-lahi al-riz'qa wa-u'buduhu wa-ush'kuru lahu ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Only you worship besides besides Allah idols and you create falsehood Indeed those whom you worship besides besides Allah (do) not possess for you provision So seek any from Allah the provision and worship Him and be grateful to Him To Him you will be returned

ayah: إِنَّمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا وَتَخۡلُقُونَ إِفۡكًاۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ لَكُمۡ رِزۡقٗا فَٱبۡتَغُواْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرِّزۡقَ وَٱعۡبُدُوهُ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لَهُۥٓۖ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

ayah: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُواْ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
ayah_translit: wa-in tukadhibu faqad kadhaba umamun min qablikum wama ala al-rasuli illa al-balaghu al-mubinu
ayah_english: And if you deny then verily denied (the) nations before you before you And not (is) on the Messenger except the conveyance clear

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
ayah_english: Do not they see how Allah originates Allah originates the creation then repeats it Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
ayah_english: Do not they see how Allah originates Allah originates the creation then repeats it Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

ayah_english: Do not they see how Allah originates Allah originates the creation then repeats it Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ بَدَأَ ٱلۡخَلۡقَۚ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ يُنشِئُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: qul siru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa bada-a al-khalqa thumma al-lahu yunshi-u al-nashata al-akhirata inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: Say Travel in the earth and see how He originated the creation Then Allah will produce the creation the last Indeed Allah on every thing (is) All-Powerful

ayah: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ بَدَأَ ٱلۡخَلۡقَۚ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ يُنشِئُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah_translit: qul siru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa bada-a al-khalqa thumma al-lahu yunshi-u al-nashata al-akhirata inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: Say Travel in the earth and see how He originated the creation Then Allah will produce the creation the last Indeed Allah on every thing (is) All-Powerful

ayah: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ
ayah_translit: yu'adhibu man yashau wayarhamu man yashau wa-ilayhi tuq'labuna
ayah_english: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy (on) whom He wills and to Him you will be returned

ayah: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

ayah: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ
ayah_translit: wama antum bimu'jizina fi al-ardi wala fi al-samai wama lakum min duni al-lahi min waliyyin wala nasirin
ayah_english: And not you can escape in the earth and not in the heaven And not for you besides besides Allah any protector and not a helper

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِقَآئِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يَئِسُواْ مِن رَّحۡمَتِي وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kafaru biayati al-lahi waliqaihi ulaika ya-isu min rahmati wa-ulaika lahum adhabun alimun
ayah_english: And those who disbelieve in (the) Signs (of) Allah and (the) meeting (with) Him those (have) despaired of My Mercy And those for them (is) a punishment painful

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِقَآئِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يَئِسُواْ مِن رَّحۡمَتِي وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kafaru biayati al-lahi waliqaihi ulaika ya-isu min rahmati wa-ulaika lahum adhabun alimun
ayah_english: And those who disbelieve in (the) Signs (of) Allah and (the) meeting (with) Him those (have) despaired of My Mercy And those for them (is) a punishment painful

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِقَآئِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يَئِسُواْ مِن رَّحۡمَتِي وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kafaru biayati al-lahi waliqaihi ulaika ya-isu min rahmati wa-ulaika lahum adhabun alimun
ayah_english: And those who disbelieve in (the) Signs (of) Allah and (the) meeting (with) Him those (have) despaired of My Mercy And those for them (is) a punishment painful

ayah: فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱقۡتُلُوهُ أَوۡ حَرِّقُوهُ فَأَنجَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu uq'tuluhu aw harriquhu fa-anjahu al-lahu mina al-nari inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
ayah_english: And not was (the) answer (of) his people except that they said Kill him or burn him But Allah saved him But Allah saved him from the fire Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for a people who believe

ayah: وَقَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱتَّخَذۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا مَّوَدَّةَ بَيۡنِكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ ثُمَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُ بَعۡضُكُم بِبَعۡضٖ وَيَلۡعَنُ بَعۡضُكُم بَعۡضٗا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala innama ittakhadhtum min duni al-lahi awthanan mawaddata baynikum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya thumma yawma al-qiyamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'din wayal'anu ba'dukum ba'dan wamawakumu al-naru wama lakum min nasirina
ayah_english: And he said Only you have taken besides besides Allah idols (out of) love among you in the life (of) the world Then (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection you will deny one another one another and curse one another one another and your abode (will be) the Fire and not for you any helpers

ayah: وَقَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱتَّخَذۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا مَّوَدَّةَ بَيۡنِكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ ثُمَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُ بَعۡضُكُم بِبَعۡضٖ وَيَلۡعَنُ بَعۡضُكُم بَعۡضٗا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala innama ittakhadhtum min duni al-lahi awthanan mawaddata baynikum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya thumma yawma al-qiyamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'din wayal'anu ba'dukum ba'dan wamawakumu al-naru wama lakum min nasirina
ayah_english: And he said Only you have taken besides besides Allah idols (out of) love among you in the life (of) the world Then (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection you will deny one another one another and curse one another one another and your abode (will be) the Fire and not for you any helpers

ayah: وَقَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱتَّخَذۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا مَّوَدَّةَ بَيۡنِكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ ثُمَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُ بَعۡضُكُم بِبَعۡضٖ وَيَلۡعَنُ بَعۡضُكُم بَعۡضٗا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ

ayah: ۞فَـَٔامَنَ لَهُۥ لُوطٞۘ وَقَالَ إِنِّي مُهَاجِرٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: faamana lahu lutun waqala inni muhajirun ila rabbi innahu huwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And believed [in] him Lut and he said Indeed I (am) emigrating to my Lord Indeed He [He] (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah_translit: faamana lahu lutun waqala inni muhajirun ila rabbi innahu huwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And believed [in] him Lut and he said Indeed I (am) emigrating to my Lord Indeed He [He] (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِ ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَجۡرَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: wawahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba waja'alna fi dhurriyyatihi al-nubuwata wal-kitaba waataynahu ajrahu fi al-dun'ya wa-innahu fi al-akhirati lamina al-salihina
ayah_english: And We granted to him Ishaq and Yaqub and We placed in his offsprings the Prophethood and the Book And We gave him his reward in the world And indeed he in the Hereafter (is) surely among the righteous

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِ ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَجۡرَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: wawahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba waja'alna fi dhurriyyatihi al-nubuwata wal-kitaba waataynahu ajrahu fi al-dun'ya wa-innahu fi al-akhirati lamina al-salihina
ayah_english: And We granted to him Ishaq and Yaqub and We placed in his offsprings the Prophethood and the Book And We gave him his reward in the world And indeed he in the Hereafter (is) surely among the righteous

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِ ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَجۡرَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: wawahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba waja'alna fi dhurriyyatihi al-nubuwata wal-kitaba waataynahu ajrahu fi al-dun'ya wa-innahu fi al-akhirati lamina al-salihina
ayah_english: And We granted to him Ishaq and Yaqub and We placed in his offsprings the Prophethood and the Book And We gave him his reward in the world And indeed he in the Hereafter (is) surely among the righteous

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِ ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَجۡرَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

ayah: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: walutan idh qala liqawmihi innakum latatuna al-fahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina al-'alamina
ayah_english: And Lut when he said to his people Indeed you commit the immorality not has preceded you with it any one from the worlds

ayah: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: walutan idh qala liqawmihi innakum latatuna al-fahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina al-'alamina
ayah_english: And Lut when he said to his people Indeed you commit the immorality not has preceded you with it any one from the worlds

ayah: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ وَتَقۡطَعُونَ ٱلسَّبِيلَ وَتَأۡتُونَ فِي نَادِيكُمُ ٱلۡمُنكَرَۖ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: a-innakum latatuna al-rijala wataqta'una al-sabila watatuna fi nadikumu al-munkara fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu i'tina bi'adhabi al-lahi in kunta mina al-sadiqina
ayah_english: Indeed you approach the men and you cut off the road and commit in your meetings evil And not was (the) answer (of) his people except that they said Bring upon us (the) punishment (of) Allah if you are of the truthful

ayah: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ وَتَقۡطَعُونَ ٱلسَّبِيلَ وَتَأۡتُونَ فِي نَادِيكُمُ ٱلۡمُنكَرَۖ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

ayah: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ وَتَقۡطَعُونَ ٱلسَّبِيلَ وَتَأۡتُونَ فِي نَادِيكُمُ ٱلۡمُنكَرَۖ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi unsur'ni ala al-qawmi al-muf'sidina
ayah_english: He said My Lord! Help me against the people the corrupters

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ بِٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُهۡلِكُوٓاْ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِۖ إِنَّ أَهۡلَهَا كَانُواْ ظَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: walamma jaat rusuluna ib'rahima bil-bush'ra qalu inna muh'liku ahli hadhihi al-qaryati inna ahlaha kanu zalimina
ayah_english: And when came Our messengers (to) Ibrahim with the glad tidings they said Indeed we (are) going to destroy (the) people (of) this town Indeed its people are wrongdoers

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّ فِيهَا لُوطٗاۚ قَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن فِيهَاۖ لَنُنَجِّيَنَّهُۥ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: qala inna fiha lutan qalu nahnu a'lamu biman fiha lanunajjiyannahu wa-ahlahu illa im'ra-atahu kanat mina al-ghabirina
ayah_english: He said Indeed in it (is) Lut They said We know better who (is) in it We will surely save him and his family except his wife She (is) of those who remain behind

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّ فِيهَا لُوطٗاۚ قَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن فِيهَاۖ لَنُنَجِّيَنَّهُۥ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

ayah: وَلَمَّآ أَن جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَا لُوطٗا سِيٓءَ بِهِمۡ وَضَاقَ بِهِمۡ ذَرۡعٗاۖ وَقَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ إِنَّا مُنَجُّوكَ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَكَ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: walamma an jaat rusuluna lutan sia bihim wadaqa bihim dhar'an waqalu la takhaf wala tahzan inna munajjuka wa-ahlaka illa im'ra-ataka kanat mina al-ghabirina
ayah_english: And when [that] came Our messengers (to) Lut he was distressed for them and felt straitened for them (and) uneasy And they said (Do) not fear and (do) not grieve Indeed we (will) save you and your family except your wife She (is) of those who remain behind

ayah_english: And when [that] came Our messengers (to) Lut he was distressed for them and felt straitened for them (and) uneasy And they said (Do) not fear and (do) not grieve Indeed we (will) save you and your family except your wife She (is) of those who remain behind

ayah: إِنَّا مُنزِلُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ
ayah_translit: inna munziluna ala ahli hadhihi al-qaryati rij'zan mina al-samai bima kanu yafsuquna
ayah_english: Indeed we (will) bring down on (the) people (of) this town a punishment from (the) sky because they have been defiantly disobedient

ayah: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَا مِنۡهَآ ءَايَةَۢ بَيِّنَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad tarakna min'ha ayatan bayyinatan liqawmin ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And verily We have left about it a sign (as) evidence for a people who use reason

ayah: وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡيَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٗا فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱرۡجُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-ila madyana akhahum shu'ayban faqala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha wa-ir'ju al-yawma al-akhira wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
ayah_english: And to Madyan their brother Shuaib And he said O my people! Worship Allah and expect the Day the Last and (do) not commit evil in the earth (as) corrupters

ayah: وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡيَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٗا فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱرۡجُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

ayah: وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡيَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٗا فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱرۡجُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

ayah: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
ayah_translit: fakadhabuhu fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
ayah_english: But they denied him so seized them the earthquake and they became in their home fallen prone

ayah: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَقَد تَّبَيَّنَ لَكُم مِّن مَّسَٰكِنِهِمۡۖ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَصَدَّهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَكَانُواْ مُسۡتَبۡصِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa'adan wathamuda waqad tabayyana lakum min masakinihim wazayyana lahumu al-shaytanu a'malahum fasaddahum ani al-sabili wakanu mus'tabsirina
ayah_english: And Aad and Thamud and verily (has) become clear to you from their dwellings And made fair-seeming to them the Shaitaan their deeds and averted them from the Way though they were endowed with insight

ayah_translit: wa'adan wathamuda waqad tabayyana lakum min masakinihim wazayyana lahumu al-shaytanu a'malahum fasaddahum ani al-sabili wakanu mus'tabsirina
ayah_english: And Aad and Thamud and verily (has) become clear to you from their dwellings And made fair-seeming to them the Shaitaan their deeds and averted them from the Way though they were endowed with insight

ayah: وَقَٰرُونَ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُواْ سَٰبِقِينَ
ayah_translit: waqaruna wafir'awna wahamana walaqad jaahum musa bil-bayinati fa-is'takbaru fi al-ardi wama kanu sabiqina
ayah_english: And Qarun and Firaun and Haman And certainly came to them Musa with clear evidences but they were arrogant in the earth and not they could outstrip Us

ayah: وَقَٰرُونَ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُواْ سَٰبِقِينَ

ayah: فَكُلًّا أَخَذۡنَا بِذَنۢبِهِۦۖ فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ حَاصِبٗا وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ خَسَفۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَغۡرَقۡنَاۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: fakullan akhadhna bidhanbihi famin'hum man arsalna alayhi hasiban wamin'hum man akhadhathu al-sayhatu wamin'hum man khasafna bihi al-arda wamin'hum man aghraqna wama kana al-lahu liyazlimahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
ayah_english: So each We seized for his sin Then of them (was he) who We sent on him a violent storm and of them (was he) who seized him the awful cry and of them (was he) who We caused to swallow him the earth and of them (was he) who We drowned And not was Allah to wrong them but they were themselves doing wrong

ayah: فَكُلًّا أَخَذۡنَا بِذَنۢبِهِۦۖ فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ حَاصِبٗا وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ خَسَفۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَغۡرَقۡنَاۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

ayah: فَكُلًّا أَخَذۡنَا بِذَنۢبِهِۦۖ فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ حَاصِبٗا وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ خَسَفۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ أَغۡرَقۡنَاۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

ayah_english: So each We seized for his sin Then of them (was he) who We sent on him a violent storm and of them (was he) who seized him the awful cry and of them (was he) who We caused to swallow him the earth and of them (was he) who We drowned And not was Allah to wrong them but they were themselves doing wrong

ayah: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَ كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِ ٱتَّخَذَتۡ بَيۡتٗاۖ وَإِنَّ أَوۡهَنَ ٱلۡبُيُوتِ لَبَيۡتُ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: mathalu alladhina ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi awliyaa kamathali al-'ankabuti ittakhadhat baytan wa-inna awhana al-buyuti labaytu al-'ankabuti law kanu ya'lamuna
ayah_english: (The) example (of) those who take besides besides Allah protectors (is) like the spider who takes a house And indeed the weakest (of) houses (is) surely (the) house (of) the spider if (only) they know

ayah: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَ كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِ ٱتَّخَذَتۡ بَيۡتٗاۖ وَإِنَّ أَوۡهَنَ ٱلۡبُيُوتِ لَبَيۡتُ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_english: (The) example (of) those who take besides besides Allah protectors (is) like the spider who takes a house And indeed the weakest (of) houses (is) surely (the) house (of) the spider if (only) they know

ayah: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَ كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِ ٱتَّخَذَتۡ بَيۡتٗاۖ وَإِنَّ أَوۡهَنَ ٱلۡبُيُوتِ لَبَيۡتُ ٱلۡعَنكَبُوتِۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: inna al-laha ya'lamu ma yad'una min dunihi min shayin wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: Indeed Allah knows what they invoke besides Him besides Him any thing And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: watil'ka al-amthalu nadribuha lilnnasi wama ya'qiluha illa al-'alimuna
ayah_english: And these examples We set forth to mankind but not will understand them except those of knowledge

ayah: خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: khalaqa al-lahu al-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi inna fi dhalika laayatan lil'mu'minina
ayah_english: Allah created Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth Indeed in that (is) surely a Sign for the believers

ayah: ٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۖ إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ تَنۡهَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَٱلۡمُنكَرِۗ وَلَذِكۡرُ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَصۡنَعُونَ
ayah_translit: ut'lu ma uhiya ilayka mina al-kitabi wa-aqimi al-salata inna al-salata tanha ani al-fahshai wal-munkari waladhik'ru al-lahi akbaru wal-lahu ya'lamu ma tasna'una
ayah_english: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish the prayer Indeed the prayer prevents from the immorality and evil deeds and surely (the) remembrance (of) Allah (is) greatest And Allah knows what you do

ayah: ٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۖ إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ تَنۡهَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَٱلۡمُنكَرِۗ وَلَذِكۡرُ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَصۡنَعُونَ

ayah: ۞وَلَا تُجَٰدِلُوٓاْ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡنَا وَأُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَإِلَٰهُنَا وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ وَٰحِدٞ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ مُسۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: wala tujadilu ahla al-kitabi illa bi-allati hiya ahsanu illa alladhina zalamu min'hum waqulu amanna bi-alladhi unzila ilayna wa-unzila ilaykum wa-ilahuna wa-ilahukum wahidun wanahnu lahu mus'limuna
ayah_english: And (do) not argue (with the) People of the Book except by which [it] (is) best except those who (do) wrong among them and say We believe in that (which) has been revealed to us and was revealed to you And our God and your God (is) One and we to Him submit

ayah: ۞وَلَا تُجَٰدِلُوٓاْ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡنَا وَأُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَإِلَٰهُنَا وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ وَٰحِدٞ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ مُسۡلِمُونَ

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦۖ وَمِنۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِهِۦۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wakadhalika anzalna ilayka al-kitaba fa-alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba yu'minuna bihi wamin haulai man yu'minu bihi wama yajhadu biayatina illa al-kafiruna
ayah_english: And thus We (have) revealed to you the Book So those We gave [them] the Book believe therein And among these (are some) who believe therein And none reject Our Verses except the disbelievers

ayah_translit: wakadhalika anzalna ilayka al-kitaba fa-alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba yu'minuna bihi wamin haulai man yu'minu bihi wama yajhadu biayatina illa al-kafiruna

ayah_english: And thus We (have) revealed to you the Book So those We gave [them] the Book believe therein And among these (are some) who believe therein And none reject Our Verses except the disbelievers

ayah: وَمَا كُنتَ تَتۡلُواْ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِن كِتَٰبٖ وَلَا تَخُطُّهُۥ بِيَمِينِكَۖ إِذٗا لَّٱرۡتَابَ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kunta tatlu min qablihi min kitabin wala takhuttuhu biyaminika idhan la-ir'taba al-mub'tiluna
ayah_english: And not (did) you recite before it before it any Book and not (did) you write it with your right hand in that case surely (would) have doubted the falsifiers

ayah: وَمَا كُنتَ تَتۡلُواْ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِن كِتَٰبٖ وَلَا تَخُطُّهُۥ بِيَمِينِكَۖ إِذٗا لَّٱرۡتَابَ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ

ayah_english: And not (did) you recite before it before it any Book and not (did) you write it with your right hand in that case surely (would) have doubted the falsifiers

ayah: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: bal huwa ayatun bayyinatun fi suduri alladhina utu al-'il'ma wama yajhadu biayatina illa al-zalimuna
ayah_english: Nay it (is) Verses clear in (the) breasts (of) those who are given the knowledge And not reject Our Verses except the wrongdoers

ayah: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: bal huwa ayatun bayyinatun fi suduri alladhina utu al-'il'ma wama yajhadu biayatina illa al-zalimuna
ayah_english: Nay it (is) Verses clear in (the) breasts (of) those who are given the knowledge And not reject Our Verses except the wrongdoers

ayah: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

ayah: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_translit: waqalu lawla unzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi qul innama al-ayatu inda al-lahi wa-innama ana nadhirun mubinun
ayah_english: And they say Why not are sent down to him (the) Signs from his Lord Say Only the Signs (are) with Allah and only I (am) a warner clear

ayah: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِهِمۡ أَنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَرَحۡمَةٗ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yakfihim anna anzalna alayka al-kitaba yut'la alayhim inna fi dhalika larahmatan wadhik'ra liqawmin yu'minuna
ayah_english: And is (it) not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book (which) is recited to them Indeed in that surely is a mercy and a reminder for a people who believe

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِهِمۡ أَنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَرَحۡمَةٗ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِهِمۡ أَنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَرَحۡمَةٗ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yakfihim anna anzalna alayka al-kitaba yut'la alayhim inna fi dhalika larahmatan wadhik'ra liqawmin yu'minuna
ayah_english: And is (it) not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book (which) is recited to them Indeed in that surely is a mercy and a reminder for a people who believe

ayah_english: And is (it) not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book (which) is recited to them Indeed in that surely is a mercy and a reminder for a people who believe

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِهِمۡ أَنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَرَحۡمَةٗ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah_english: And is (it) not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book (which) is recited to them Indeed in that surely is a mercy and a reminder for a people who believe

ayah: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَكَفَرُواْ بِٱللَّهِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul kafa bil-lahi bayni wabaynakum shahidan ya'lamu ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi wa-alladhina amanu bil-batili wakafaru bil-lahi ulaika humu al-khasiruna
ayah_english: Say Sufficient is Allah between me and between you (as) Witness He knows what (is) in the heavens and the earth And those who believe in [the] falsehood and disbelieve in Allah those they (are) the losers

ayah: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَكَفَرُواْ بِٱللَّهِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

ayah_english: Say Sufficient is Allah between me and between you (as) Witness He knows what (is) in the heavens and the earth And those who believe in [the] falsehood and disbelieve in Allah those they (are) the losers

ayah_english: Say Sufficient is Allah between me and between you (as) Witness He knows what (is) in the heavens and the earth And those who believe in [the] falsehood and disbelieve in Allah those they (are) the losers

ayah: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَكَفَرُواْ بِٱللَّهِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul kafa bil-lahi bayni wabaynakum shahidan ya'lamu ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi wa-alladhina amanu bil-batili wakafaru bil-lahi ulaika humu al-khasiruna
ayah_english: Say Sufficient is Allah between me and between you (as) Witness He knows what (is) in the heavens and the earth And those who believe in [the] falsehood and disbelieve in Allah those they (are) the losers

ayah: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَلَوۡلَآ أَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى لَّجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ وَلَيَأۡتِيَنَّهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wayasta'jilunaka bil-'adhabi walawla ajalun musamman lajaahumu al-'adhabu walayatiyannahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: And they ask you to hasten [with] the punishment And if not (for) a term appointed surely (would) have come to them the punishment But it will surely come to them suddenly while they (do) not perceive
word_tranlation: And they ask you to hasten

ayah: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَلَوۡلَآ أَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى لَّجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ وَلَيَأۡتِيَنَّهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wayasta'jilunaka bil-'adhabi walawla ajalun musamman lajaahumu al-'adhabu walayatiyannahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: And they ask you to hasten [with] the punishment And if not (for) a term appointed surely (would) have come to them the punishment But it will surely come to them suddenly while they (do) not perceive

ayah_translit: wayasta'jilunaka bil-'adhabi walawla ajalun musamman lajaahumu al-'adhabu walayatiyannahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: And they ask you to hasten [with] the punishment And if not (for) a term appointed surely (would) have come to them the punishment But it will surely come to them suddenly while they (do) not perceive

ayah: يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةُۢ بِٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: yasta'jilunaka bil-'adhabi wa-inna jahannama lamuhitatun bil-kafirina
ayah_english: They ask you to hasten the punishment And indeed Hell will surely encompass the disbelievers

ayah: يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةُۢ بِٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَغۡشَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَمِن تَحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ذُوقُواْ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: yawma yaghshahumu al-'adhabu min fawqihim wamin tahti arjulihim wayaqulu dhuqu ma kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: On (the) Day will cover them the punishment from above them and from below their feet and He will say Taste what you used (to) do

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَغۡشَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَمِن تَحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ذُوقُواْ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِنَّ أَرۡضِي وَٰسِعَةٞ فَإِيَّـٰيَ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
ayah_translit: ya'ibadiya alladhina amanu inna ardi wasi'atun fa-iyyaya fa-u'buduni
ayah_english: O My servants who believe! Indeed My earth (is) spacious so only worship Me

ayah: يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِنَّ أَرۡضِي وَٰسِعَةٞ فَإِيَّـٰيَ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
ayah_translit: ya'ibadiya alladhina amanu inna ardi wasi'atun fa-iyyaya fa-u'buduni
ayah_english: O My servants who believe! Indeed My earth (is) spacious so only worship Me

ayah: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: kullu nafsin dhaiqatu al-mawti thumma ilayna tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Every soul (will) taste the death Then to Us you will be returned

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ غُرَفٗا تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ نِعۡمَ أَجۡرُ ٱلۡعَٰمِلِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lanubawwi-annahum mina al-janati ghurafan tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha ni'ma ajru al-'amilina
ayah_english: And those who believe and do [the] righteous deeds surely We will give them a place in Paradise lofty dwellings flow from underneath it the rivers will abide forever in it Excellent is (the) reward (of) the workers

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ غُرَفٗا تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ نِعۡمَ أَجۡرُ ٱلۡعَٰمِلِينَ

ayah_translit: alladhina sabaru wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
ayah_english: Those who (are) patient and upon their Lord put their trust

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina sabaru wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna

ayah: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٖ لَّا تَحۡمِلُ رِزۡقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: waka-ayyin min dabbatin la tahmilu riz'qaha al-lahu yarzuquha wa-iyyakum wahuwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: And how many of a creature (does) not carry its provision Allah provides (for) it and (for) you And He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Knower

ayah_english: And how many of a creature (does) not carry its provision Allah provides (for) it and (for) you And He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Knower

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara layaqulunna al-lahu fa-anna yu'fakuna
ayah_english: And if you ask them Who created the heavens and the earth and subjected the sun and the moon Surely they would say Allah Then how are they deluded

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

ayah: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: al-lahu yabsutu al-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lahu inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
ayah_english: Allah extends the provision for whom He wills of His slaves and restricts for him Indeed Allah of every thing (is) All-Knower

ayah: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: al-lahu yabsutu al-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lahu inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
ayah_english: Allah extends the provision for whom He wills of His slaves and restricts for him Indeed Allah of every thing (is) All-Knower

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّن نَّزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِهَا لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in sa-altahum man nazzala mina al-samai maan fa-ahya bihi al-arda min ba'di mawtiha layaqulunna al-lahu quli al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And if you ask them Who sends down from the sky water and gives life thereby (to) the earth after after its death Surely, they would say Allah Say All Praises (are) for Allah But most of them (do) not use reason

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّن نَّزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِهَا لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّن نَّزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِهَا لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا لَهۡوٞ وَلَعِبٞۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ لَهِيَ ٱلۡحَيَوَانُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama hadhihi al-hayatu al-dun'ya illa lahwun wala'ibun wa-inna al-dara al-akhirata lahiya al-hayawanu law kanu ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And not (is) this life (of) the world but amusement and play And indeed the Home (of) the Hereafter surely it (is) the life if only they know

ayah: وَمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا لَهۡوٞ وَلَعِبٞۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ لَهِيَ ٱلۡحَيَوَانُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah_english: And not (is) this life (of) the world but amusement and play And indeed the Home (of) the Hereafter surely it (is) the life if only they know

ayah: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-idha rakibu fi al-ful'ki da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu al-dina falamma najjahum ila al-bari idha hum yush'rikuna
ayah_english: And when they embark [in] the ship they call Allah (being) sincere to Him (in) the religion But when He delivers them to the land behold they associate partners (with Him)

ayah: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

ayah: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: liyakfuru bima ataynahum waliyatamatta'u fasawfa ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So that they may deny [in] what We have given them and they may enjoy (themselves) But soon they will know

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا جَعَلۡنَا حَرَمًا ءَامِنٗا وَيُتَخَطَّفُ ٱلنَّاسُ مِنۡ حَوۡلِهِمۡۚ أَفَبِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ يُؤۡمِنُونَ وَبِنِعۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِ يَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw anna ja'alna haraman aminan wayutakhattafu al-nasu min hawlihim afabil-batili yu'minuna wabini'mati al-lahi yakfuruna
ayah_english: Do not they see that We have made a Sanctuary secure while are being taken away the people around them around them Then do in the falsehood they believe and in (the) Favor (of) Allah they disbelieve

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُۥٓۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba bil-haqi lamma jaahu alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'kafirina
ayah_english: And who (is) more unjust than (he) who invents against Allah a lie or denies the truth when it has come to him Is there not in Hell an abode for the disbelievers

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُۥٓۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba bil-haqi lamma jaahu alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'kafirina

ayah_translit: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba bil-haqi lamma jaahu alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'kafirina
ayah_english: And who (is) more unjust than (he) who invents against Allah a lie or denies the truth when it has come to him Is there not in Hell an abode for the disbelievers

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina jahadu fina lanahdiyannahum subulana wa-inna al-laha lama'a al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And those who strive for Us We will surely guide them (to) Our ways And indeed Allah surely (is) with the good-doers
